Class Battle

java.lang.Object
game.battle.Battle
public class Battle extends Object
This class manages the battle between player and an enemy, manages turns and shows results

  • Constructor Details

    • Battle

      public Battle(Player newPlayer, Enemy newEnemy)
      Battle class constructor
      Parameters:
      newPlayer - Player who takes part in the battle
      newEnemy - Enemy who is against the player

  • Method Details

    • rotate

      public void rotate()
      Changes turn while player and enemy aren't dead

    • isPlayerWinner

      public boolean isPlayerWinner()
      When someone dies, check if the player is dead
      Returns:
      true if player still alive, false otherwise

    • isAnyoneDead

      public boolean isAnyoneDead()
      Check if someone is dead
      Returns:
      true if either player or enemy is dead, false if both are alive

    • end

      public void end()
      Ends the battle and enables the winning or losing buttons

      public void showResults()
